entries.meaning: Flow in the opposite direction to normal.
examples: Example:  Contra-flow cycling is most often applied on basic cycle network links in low-speed local access roads, both within and outside the built-up area  (European English)

Example:  Contra-flow cycling is a regulatory measure. In streets and roads with a one-way traffic restriction, cyclists are exempt from the one-way restriction and are allowed to drive against the flow of motorized traffic. (European English)

entries.meaning: An abnormal state of a road or motorway where the traffic temporarily travels in the opposite direction to normal, usually as a result of repair work or an accident.
